typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		vendorID as string,
		tpepPickupDateTime as timestamp,
		tpepDropoffDateTime as timestamp,
		passengerCount as integer,
		tripDistance as double,
		puLocationId as string,
		doLocationId as string,
		startLon as double,
		startLat as double,
		endLon as double,
		endLat as double,
		rateCodeId as integer,
		storeAndFwdFlag as string,
		paymentType as string,
		fareAmount as double,
		extra as double,
		mtaTax as double,
		improvementSurcharge as string,
		tipAmount as double,
		tollsAmount as double,
		totalAmount as double,
		puYear as string,
		puMonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> waginput
waginput select(mapColumn(
		vendorID,
		tpepPickupDateTime,
		tpepDropoffDateTime,
		passengerCount,
		tripDistance,
		puLocationId,
		doLocationId,
		startLon,
		startLat,
		endLon,
		endLat,
		rateCodeId,
		storeAndFwdFlag,
		paymentType,
		fareAmount,
		extra,
		mtaTax,
		improvementSurcharge,
		tipAmount,
		tollsAmount,
		totalAmount,
		puYear,
		puMonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		vendorID as string,
		tpepPickupDateTime as timestamp,
		tpepDropoffDateTime as timestamp,
		passengerCount as integer,
		tripDistance as double,
		puLocationId as string,
		doLocationId as string,
		startLon as double,
		startLat as double,
		endLon as double,
		endLat as double,
		rateCodeId as integer,
		storeAndFwdFlag as string,
		paymentType as string,
		fareAmount as double,
		extra as double,
		mtaTax as double,
		improvementSurcharge as string,
		tipAmount as double,
		tollsAmount as double,
		totalAmount as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 10000,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> hyperscale
